## âœ… Checklist

<!-- Mark items with an 'x' when complete -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] SwiftLint passes with no errors

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Snapshot tests have been updated if UI changed
- [ ] I have tested on multiple device sizes/orientations (if UI changes)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have added/updated code comments

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have updated `project.yml` if dependencies changed
- [ ] I have regenerated the Xcode project using `scripts/generate_xcodeproj.sh`
- [ ] All Swift Package dependencies resolve correctly

### Git

- [ ] My branch is up to date with main
- [ ] I have resolved all merge conflicts
- [ ] My commits are properly formatted and descriptive
- [ ] I have not included unrelated changes
